about_the_game:
About This Game


"Foster The Monster"

🚀 Venture beyond dimensions, pioneering a new destiny for humanity. 🚀

In the year 2080, Earth has been devastated by reckless technology. Christopher Sterling, a new researcher at Bogus Inc., explores various planets using a dimensional travel device, capturing and studying different life forms that could aid human life advancement. These creatures, known as 'Fosmon,' are the focus of his research, which he continues despite the potential threats they might pose to humanity

"Action Adventure"
Explore various planets and capture Fosmons. Each planet has its own unique Force Monsters, and the deeper you explore, the higher-grade Fosmons appear.

"Deck Building"
Capture and research Fosmons to receive grants from the government. Each Fosmons has its unique characteristics. Draw cards to complete your deck and conduct experiments on the Fosmons. Once the research is completed, information will randomly open in the Fosmons encyclopedia. Also, use the grants to strengthen the player to explore the planets longer and ultimately defeat the boss Fosmon!

Collect random cards each day and choose your cards to find the best deck-building strategy for Fosmon research. maximize Fosmon development and strengthen the player to protect Earth from Fosmons.
